segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 1: A group of segments identifying the AUTHOR message.

segment.name: Beginning of message
segment.documentation: BGM, A segment for unique identification of the Authorisation message, its type and function; specifying if it is an authorisation or a request for authorisation.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment containing the creation date of the Authorisation Message.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 2: A group of segments identifying the message to authorise and possibly the request to an authorisation which has been previously sent.

segment.name: Reference
segment.documentation: RFF, A segment referring to the message that has to be authorised or to a previously sent request for authorisation.

segment.name: Monetary amount
segment.documentation:
MOA, A segment used to check the financial amount of the original message to be authorised. If the original message is a multiple message, the amount is the total amount of this message.
It indicates the type of amount used in the original message. The currency in this segment should be the same as in the original message.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment indicating the date and time of creation of the message referenced in the RFF segment or possibly the payment date.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 3: A group of segments identifying the parties involved in the exchange of the message.

segment.name: Name and address
segment.documentation: NAD, A segment identifying the name and address of the commercial parties involved in the exchange of this message. (Sender and Recipient).

segment.name: Contact information
segment.documentation: CTA, A segment identifying a person or department for the party specified in the NAD segment and to whom communication should be directed.

segment.name: Communication contact
segment.documentation: COM, A segment providing communication numbers for the party identified in the NAD segment and optionally for the contact identified in the associated CTA segment.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 4: A group of segments identifying the financial parties involved in the exchange of the message.

segment.name: Financial institution information
segment.documentation: FII, A segment identifying the ordered bank acting for the ordering customer and/or payor and the relevant account number and currency.

segment.name: Contact information
segment.documentation: CTA, A segment identifying a person or department for the party specified in the NAD segment and to whom communication should be directed.

segment.name: Communication contact
segment.documentation: COM, A segment providing communication numbers for the party identified in the NAD segment and optionally for the contact identified in the associated CTA segment.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 5: A segment group identifying the authentication procedures used.

segment.name: Authentication result
segment.documentation: AUT, A segment specifying the details of any authentication (validation) procedure applied to the Authorisation message.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment defining the date and time of the creation of the authentication.
